mapper.insert: INSERT INTO votes (user_id, camp_id, total, location, cleanliness, kindness, price, facilities, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{campId}, #{total}, #{location}, #{cleanliness}, #{kindness}, #{price},#{facilities}, #{isDeleted}, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM votes WHERE camp_id=#{campId} AND user_id=#{userId};
